ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: GRANTED TO NON-TRADITIONAL SECOND-YEAR STUDENTS IN THE R.N. AND RADIOLOGICAL TECH PROGRAMS AT NORTH COUNTRY COMMUNITY COLLEGE (NCCC), SARANAC LAKE, NY. UP TO 20 SCHOLARSHIP AWARDS OF UP TO $2,000 PER YEAR. APPLICATIONS SUBMITTED BY STUDENTS THROUGH NCCC.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.SubmissionDeadlinesTxt: JUNE 1 OF THE YEAR THE STUDENT WILL BEGIN CLASSES AT NCCC.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: STUDENT MUST BE A RESIDENT OF ESSEX, FRANKLIN OR HAMILTON COUNTY, NEW YORK, AND HAVE BEEN ACCEPTED IN A QUALIFYING PROGRAM AT NCCC.

ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: GRANTED TO GRADUATING HIGH SCHOOL PARTICIPANTS IN THE NEW VISIONS PROGRAM AT ADIRONDACK MEDICAL CENTER (AMC), SARANAC LAKE, NY. 10 SCHOLARSHIP AWARDS OF $1,000 EACH. APPLICATIONS SUBMITTED DIRECTLY BY NEW VISION STUDENTS AT AMC.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.SubmissionDeadlinesTxt: JUNE 1 OF THE YEAR THE STUDENT WILL BEGIN COLLEGE CLASSES AT THE SCHOOL HE OR SHE WILL ATTEND.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: STUDENT MUST BE A PARTICIPANT IN THE NEW VISIONS PROGRAM AT AMC IN SARANAC LAKE.

ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RecipientPersonNm: THE DENTAL COMMITTEE CO BRENDA REEV
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE PROVIDED TO RESIDENTS LIVING IN THE SARANAC LAKE SCHOOL DISTRICT WHO ARE UNABLE TO PAY THE FULL COST OF DENTAL PROCEDURES. THE DENTIST, CHOSEN BY THE PATIENT, DISCOUNTS THE NORMAL COST OF THE REQUIRED PROCEDURES BY 10% TO 30%. THE PATIENT PAYS WHATEVER AMOUNT HE OR SHE CAN AFFORD (USUALLY 5% TO 10%). THE ASSOCIATION PAYS THE BALANCE. APPLICATION FORMS ARE AVAILABLE AT LOCAL DENTISTS AND AT THE ASSOCIATION OFFICE. PUBLICITY FOR THE PROGRAM IS ALSO GIVEN IN LOCAL NEWSPAPER NOTICES. IN ADDITION, WHEN EXTREME TREATMENT IS RECOMMENDED FOR STUDENTS IN THE LOCAL SCHOOL DISTRICT BY THE DENTAL HYGENIST, WHOSE PAY IS FUNDED 100% BY THE ASSOCIATION, AND BY A DENTIST, THE ASSOCIATION WILL PAY THE NECESSARY COSTS TO ENABLE THE STUDENT TO GET PROPER TREATMENT.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: PATIENT MUST BE A RESIDENT IN THE SARANAC LAKE SCHOOL DISTRICT (WHICH COVERS PARTS OF ESSEX, FRANKLIN AND CLINTON COUNTIES, NEW YORK).
